search.query: sourcetype=jmx host="*" jvmDescription="*" mbean_domain="java.lang" mbean_property_type="MemoryPool" | bucket _time span=1m | stats first(Type) as memoryType first(MemoryManagerNames) as memManagerNames first(Usage.max) as usageMax first(Usage.init) as usageInit first(Usage.used) as usageUsed first(Usage.committed) as usageCommitted by _time host jvmDescription Name | eval jvmpool=jvmDescription+"_"+Name | timechart span=2m max(usageUsed) as "Memory Used" by jvmpool where max in top10
